definition: the important and the less important/primary and secondary
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
to invert the importance of things (i.e. stress the incidental and neglect the main point)/lacking a sense of perspective/to put the cart before the horse

sentences.english: Distinguish primary and secondary, it is more important to energy energy puts on the main operation of the website.
sentences.chinese: 分清主次，把精力放在網站的主要運營上更重要。

sentences.english: Before you start your work every day, you should differentiate what is primary and what is secondary.
sentences.chinese: 在每天工作之前，首先要區別事情的主次順序。

sentences.english: For each resource group, we will add the primary and secondary servers.
sentences.chinese: 對於每個資源組，我們將添加主次兩臺服務器。

sentences.english: The rotation speed of crank and air flow speed are the main factors.
sentences.chinese: 其主次因素順序爲曲柄轉速和風扇進風口風速。

sentences.english: In a list, prioritize the content
sentences.chinese: 列出優先考慮的內容，分清主次。

sentences.english: A great life is the result of creating priorities.
sentences.chinese: 非凡的人生源於分清主次。

sentences.english: Not clearly distinguishing between primary and secondary actions can easily lead to failure.
sentences.chinese: 不明確區分主次操作會很容易出事。

sentences.english: Active smokers tended not only to have poorer memories but also to have trouble spearating important information from insignificant details.
sentences.chinese: 吸菸成癮者往往不僅記性差，而且分不清主次信息。

sentences.english: This will help prioritize your life.
sentences.chinese: 這會幫你爲人生分清主次。

sentences.english: All things have two sides. We must distinguish the primary and secondary. We should also consider it in full-scale.
sentences.chinese: 事物都是有兩重性，要分清主次，也必須考慮全面。

sentences.english: These are in chronological order instead of rank.
sentences.chinese: 排名不分主次，只是按照時間順序列出。

sentences.english: Create Priorities. A great life is the result of creating priorities.
sentences.chinese: 非凡的人生源於分清主次。

definition: slight or important, urgent or non-urgent (idiom); to deal with important matters first/sense of priority
to distinguish (between different things)/to make distinctions clear
careless/any-old-how, regardless of the specific task
pinyin: mei2 mao5 hu2 zi5 yi1 ba3 zhua1

definition: sequence/order
severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
slight or important, urgent or non-urgent (idiom); to deal with important matters first/sense of priority/also written 輕重緩急|轻重缓急
arrangement/order/tidiness
concise/the details in brief
priority/whether sth is urgent
clear/well-defined/limpid
an overall plan taking into account all factors
to choose/to accept or reject
order of priority/sequential order
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
as rivers Jing and Wei separate clearly (idiom)/to be entirely different
